name: hyperdash
title: Hyperdash
description: v1.0.13 - Manage Obsidian projects and tasks with TaskNotes 4.0.1 compatibility. Optimized for large vaults (37K+ files). Smart folder detection, instant note creation, all TaskNotes properties.
author: jeremyallen

preferences.name: basesTodoFile
preferences.title: Todo Base File
preferences.description: Path to your .base file for todos (vault auto-detected, cache used for speed)

preferences.name: todoViewName
preferences.title: Todo View Name
preferences.description: Name of the view to use from your todo base file (e.g., 'Todo', 'Done')

preferences.name: basesProjectFile
preferences.title: Project Base File
preferences.description: Path to your .base file for projects (vault auto-detected, cache used for speed)

preferences.name: projectViewName
preferences.title: Project View Name
preferences.description: Name of the view to use from your project base file (e.g., 'All', 'Current')

preferences.name: showRecurrence
preferences.title: Display Features
preferences.label: Show recurrence info
preferences.description: Display recurrence patterns for recurring tasks

preferences.name: maxResults
preferences.title: Performance
preferences.description: Maximum number of tasks to display (default: 500, helps with large vaults)
